description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to generate pink energy which returns anyone and anything twelve years younger, making the user a Return Return Human.

abilities.description: Ain shoots an energy ball at a target that returns it to how it was twelve years ago. Can affect living beings and inanimate objects.
abilities.limitations: The effects are undone if the user is rendered unconscious. Each touch or hit regresses the target by exactly twelve years.
combatApplications: Can revert enemies to weaker, younger states
Can turn solid ground back into magma if it solidified within twelve years
Repeated applications can eventually regress targets to non-existence

abilities.description: Physical contact spreads pink energy throughout the target's body, reversing their age by twelve years.
abilities.limitations: Requires direct contact with the target
combatApplications: Can weaken opponents by making them younger and less experienced

strengths: Can affect both living beings and inanimate objects
Can potentially eliminate opponents by regressing them to non-existence
Can manipulate the battlefield by reverting terrain
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Effects are reversed if user becomes unconscious
Requires either contact or successful projectile hit

keyMoments.title: First Demonstration in TV Anime
keyMoments.description: Ain uses Modo Modo Shot to revert solid ground back to magma during her five-hour battle with Shuzo, demonstrating the tactical versatility of the fruit.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance and demonstration of the Modo Modo no Mi's powers in the One Piece TV anime.

trivia.fact: The Modo Modo no Mi is a non-canon Devil Fruit created specifically for One Piece Film: Z and its prologue arc.
The fruit's ability to revert things exactly twelve years is highly specific, suggesting it may have limitations that prevent arbitrary time manipulation.
Ain's use of the fruit to turn solid ground back to magma during her battle with Shuzo demonstrates creative environmental manipulation beyond simple age regression of living beings.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to shrink and grow their body size from five millimeters to giant proportions while maintaining their natural strength.

abilities.description: Lily can change her body size from as small as five millimeters to her natural giant size, maintaining her giant strength regardless of current size.
combatApplications: Can shrink to avoid attacks or infiltrate small spaces
Can grow to giant size for maximum combat power
Maintains giant strength even at tiny size

strengths: Maintains physical strength at all sizes
Useful for stealth and infiltration when shrunk
Full combat power when at giant size
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Cannot swim due to Devil Fruit curse

trivia.fact: The Mini Mini no Mi is a non-canon Devil Fruit created for the Z's Ambition Arc.
Despite being born a giant, Lily typically appears in shrunken form due to her Devil Fruit, making her unique among giant characters.
